attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Im 20 years and its hard for me to live on £45 per a week now the prices are going up on food and clothing ect 
so i think that they should raise it a bit more and for people that have not been working for a certin amount of time should get put in any job avalible. Also housing benefit is £42 per a week and that should be higher as there is not many places that are less then £70 per a week in the north east of sunderland so i think they should also be raised to at least £60 and that they should help you with getting a deposit ( that is normaly £1000 ) 
i think this would help alot more people out
